alert.note: Alert for Belknap; Coastal Rockingham; Interior Rockingham; Southern Carroll; Strafford (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 13 at 11:47PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...An area of heavy snow showers will affect southern York... northeastern Rockingham...Strafford and east central Belknap Counties... At 1147 PM EST...An area of heavy snow showers was along a line extending from 7 miles southeast of Kennebunkport to near Alton...and moving south AT 35 MPH. Locations impacted include... Rochester, Biddeford, Portsmouth, Hampton, Durham, Exeter, Kittery, Alfred, Sanford, Northwood, Dover, Somersworth, Kennebunk, Barrington, Berwick, Farmington, Epping, Lebanon, Alton and Barnstead. This includes the following highways... Interstate 95 between mile markers 1 and 29. Interstate 95 in New Hampshire between mile markers 5 and 16. This also includes... York Beach, Ogunquit Beach, Wells Beach, and Fortunes Rock Beach. * Visibilities will drop quickly to less than a half mile in this area of heavy snow showers. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.

area.areaDesc: Belknap; Coastal Rockingham; Interior Rockingham; Southern Carroll; Strafford
